General.Name: Gyldendal
General.Description: Gyldendal ASA, through its subsidiaries publishes and sells books in Norway. It also operates 143 bookstores and an online bookstore. In addition, it publishes dictionaries and encyclopedias; and provides logistics and reporting services to the book industry. The company was founded in 1925 and is based in Oslo, Norway. Gyldendal ASA is a subsidiary of Erik Must AS.
